backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing registration, user profiles, servers, and authorization with in‑memory maps and role checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new userProfiles shapes and returning an empty new map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and test IDs for two backend‑related features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing UI, state, and query logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the app root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app that handles auth state, profile setup flow, layout rendering, and global providers.
frontend/src/auth/authMessages.ts: Defines auth message constants and provides functions to sanitize and categorize backend error messages by flow.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Auth context handling session restore, backend register/login calls, error mapping, and connection state.
frontend/src/auth/sessionStorage.ts: Manages saving, loading, validating, and clearing auth session data in localStorage with expiration handling.
frontend/src/auth/useAuth.ts: Exports a hook that returns the authentication context for consumer components.
Provides a centered layout wrapper with branding for authentication-related pages.
frontend/src/components/channels/Categor: Renders a collapsible channel category with drag-and-drop ordering and admin-only channel management actions.
frontend/src/components/channels/CreateC: Modal dialog for creating a new channel category with backend validation and error display.
Modal dialog for creating text or voice channels within a category, handling mutations and backend restrictions.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Text input component for composing and sending chat messages with backend readiness checks and send shortcuts.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Displays text channel messages, handles auto-scrolling, empty states, and renders a composer for sending new messages.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders an individual chat message with avatar, username, timestamp, and profile navigation.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Discov: Shows a searchable list of public servers and allows users to join them.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Server: Displays a preview card for a server with name, description, and a join button.
frontend/src/components/dms/DMHomeView.t: Shows the DM home screen or friends view, with an empty state for no messages.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRo: Renders a friend entry with avatar, status, and action buttons like message or call.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsH: Provides tabs for viewing friends, pending requests, and adding new friends with request actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSh: Desktop layout combining server rail, channel sidebar, main content, and optional member list.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainConte: Chooses and renders the correct main view based on navigation state, including chat, DMs, discovery, and settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Mobile layout using slide-out sheets for servers, channels, and members, with top bar navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Switches between desktop and mobile layouts based on window width.
frontend/src/components/members/MemberLi: Displays a scrollable list of server members, rendering each with an avatar and allowing member selection. Fetches member and profile data and shows a loading state until ready.
frontend/src/components/nav/ChannelSideb: Shows server info, categories, and channels with loading states and admin controls. Allows category expansion, channel selection, and opening server settings.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTopBar: Renders the mobile top bar with menu buttons and a dynamic title based on navigation state. Displays channel or server info and provides a members button in server view.
frontend/src/components/nav/ServerRail.t: Provides a vertical server navigation rail with home, server list, create server, and discovery actions. Supports tooltips, loading states, and server selection.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog for first‑time profile setup that pre-fills and saves the user’s display name. Handles loading, input, and submission states.
frontend/src/components/profile/RoleAssi: Dialog to assign or remove roles for a server member with per-role pending states. Fetches roles, toggles assignments, and displays role colors.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Displays a user profile sidebar overlay with avatar, banner, roles, and profile info, fetched via queries. Allows admins to open a role assignment dialog.
frontend/src/components/servers/CreateSe: Provides a dialog for creating a new server with name and optional description, handling backend state and mutation errors.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerIc: Renders a server’s icon image or a fallback initial-based icon if no custom icon is set.
frontend/src/components/settings/ServerS: Dialog for creating text or voice channels within a selected category, including backend validation and mutation handling.
Dialog for admins to move a channel to a different category, listing available destinations.
Panel for selecting a member, viewing their roles, and opening a dialog to manage role assignments.
Displays a server's audit log with sorting, formatting, and error/loading states. Fetches audit entries and renders them in a scrollable list.
Manages channel categories and channel ordering within a server. Allows admins to move channels up/down and create new channels.
Provides editable server settings such as name, description, banner, icon, and community mode. Loads server data and updates settings via mutations.
Lets admins select members and manage their assigned roles through a dialog. Displays current roles with color badges.
Allows creation of new roles with names and colors and lists existing roles. Also includes role assignment panel integration.
Hosts the server settings UI with a sidebar for switching between pages and renders the selected settings page content.
frontend/src/components/settings/UserSet: UI page for selecting theme (dark/light/system) and adjusting text scale using radio buttons and a slider.
Profile settings page that loads and edits user profile fields and username with save actions and loading states.
Container for user settings UI with navigation between profile and appearance pages. Handles logout and sidebar navigation.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Banner component showing backend connection status with loading, error instructions, and retry support.
Static stage channel layout displaying speaker and audience avatars with a raise-hand button.
Voice channel view handling join/leave actions, mute/deafen state, and listing current participants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActionGuard: Hook that disables backend actions when the backend connection is loading or in an error state.
Tracks backend connection readiness using actor initialization and a simple health query with retry support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing authentication, login state, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Provides a hook that tracks whether the viewport width is below a given breakpoint.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Implements logout logic by calling the auth provider and clearing React Query cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains multiple React Query hooks for user profiles and backend interactions with friendly error handling and mock implementations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Initializes and validates a backend actor, exposing state and retry logic for missing methods or errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for theming, including dark/light modes and utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the React app root with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Implements sign‑in and sign‑up forms with validation, tab switching, and auth error handling.
frontend/src/state/navigation.ts: Manages navigation state for views, servers, channels, and settings via a React context provider.
frontend/src/state/notifications.ts: Handles notification override storage and lookup for muted servers and channels using localStorage.
frontend/src/state/settings.ts: Provides a settings context storing theme, UI preferences, and keybinds with persistence to localStorage.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines extended frontend TypeScript interfaces mirroring backend data structures plus helpers like category conversion.
frontend/src/utils/channelOrdering.ts: Provides utilities to merge and apply channel and category ordering, and to build ordering metadata.
frontend/src/utils/hideElementByXPath.ts: Removes a specific DOM element by XPath and sets up a MutationObserver for continuous removal.
frontend/src/utils/roleColor.ts: Validates hex color values and computes contrast and luminance helpers for role colors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL and sessionStorage parameter extraction, persistence, and cleanup for routing state.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout that rejects if it exceeds a specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known issues, and pending feature requests related to backend registration functionality.
